name: Nether Expedition
description: Reach the Nether: get diamonds, mine obsidian, build portal, explore Nether fortress, collect blaze rods

steps.instruction: Mine at depth Y=-59 to Y=16 to find diamond_ore. You need at least 5 diamonds. Use iron_pickaxe or better. Branch mine at Y=-59 for best results.
Craft a diamond_pickaxe using 3 diamonds and 2 sticks at a crafting table.
Fill a bucket with water from a water source. You need this to create obsidian.
Find a lava pool. Pour water on lava source blocks to create obsidian. Then mine the obsidian with your diamond_pickaxe. You need at least 10 obsidian.
Craft flint_and_steel using 1 iron_ingot and 1 flint. Get flint by mining gravel blocks.
Build a Nether portal: place obsidian in a 4-wide by 5-tall frame (minimum). The corners can be any block. Then use flint_and_steel on the inside of the frame to light it.
Before entering the Nether, prepare: bring at least 1 stack of cobblestone (64), food (16+), iron/diamond armor, sword, pickaxe, bow + arrows if possible.
steps.done_when: equipped with armor, sword, pickaxe, and have food + building blocks

steps.instruction: Walk into the Nether portal. You will be teleported to the Nether dimension.
Explore the Nether to find a Nether Fortress (large dark brick structure). Walk along the X-axis (east/west) as fortresses generate in strips along the Z-axis. Bridge over lava with cobblestone.
Find Blaze spawners inside the Nether Fortress. Kill Blazes to collect at least 7 blaze_rods. Blazes shoot fireballs â€” use a sword and try to block or dodge.
